name: How We Talk
description: Science is that it takes the apparently infinite complexity of the world and reduces it to conceptual boxes. To me, science is basically an exercise in simplification. I am interested in the connections between these different conceptual systems. Here I wanted to think about how we can talk. Different disciplines answer this question differently, and I wanted to link some of these answers together. The result, like science, is a haphazard mix of concepts. (.PNG, 6398 X 4924 px).
